itunes:title: Aug 16, 2022 -  They Are Hiding The Affidavit, We Know Why
title: Aug 16, 2022 -  They Are Hiding The Affidavit, We Know Why
description:
Jack Posobiec provides analysis as to why Merrick Garland’s DOJ is hiding the affidavit for the Mar-a-Lago FBI raid. Savannah Hernandez interviewed a federal whistleblower who revealed that the Biden Regime is conducting secret night flights (aka, child trafficking), flying up to 10,000 kids a week from the border to sponsors throughout the country. America ignores its own backyard as the Mexican National Guard is deployed to Tijuana amid eruption of cartel-fueled violence. Finally, Minneapolis got the government they always wanted; the teachers’ union signed a contract with the city demanding that schools fire white teachers first when faced with downsizing. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
